The movie review is: The movie was excellent but it had the same title as a popular book of the same title.  We wonder if that is a factor.
The movie review is: Please stop forcing us to see movies like this! Let's go back to Star Trek, Jaws, Close Encounters of the Third Kind and that other one about the planet. The ones with charm and a reason for existing.
The movie review is: umbness. The character is like a rabbit with a headache. His droopy eyes always seem to be on a dorky shelf and the one thing you can tell he has in his pocket is a nice iPhone photo. Then the sadistic capers endemic to sydney and throughout the film take over the action.
The movie review is: Beware of this movie! It's an emotional roller coaster that will have you laughing, crying, and everything in between. This movie has been praised for its amazing performances and powerful storyline. However, it's also been criticized for being too long and dragging in some parts. The special effects are top-notch, but the plot may be too complex for some viewers.
The movie review is: It was a delightful and uplifting film that left me feeling happy and inspired. Don't miss it! <C>
The movie review is: The concept of this movie is really very interesting, but it is a bit far-fetched.
